Introduction

Park Bom is a South Korean singer currently under D-Nation Entertainment. She was a former member of the girl group 2NE1 until the group reunited on July 21st 2024.

She made her solo debut on October 28, 2009, with the single "You And I". In 2019, she made her official comeback in the industry with her mini album "Spring" under D-Nation.
